Chris O'Dell is a Senior Research Scientist at the Cooperative Institute for Research in the Atmosphere, Colorado State University.  His research focuses on improving retrievals of greenhouse gases from satellite instruments.



## Education
- [B.S. in Physics]{.fw-bold} | University of Dayton | 1995

- [PhD in Physics]{.fw-bold} | University of Wisconsin-Madison | 2002



## Professional Experience

- [2015 – present:]{.fw-bold} 	Senior Research Scientist, CIRA, Colorado State University

- [2012 – 2015:]{.fw-bold} 	Assistant Professor of Atmospheric Science, Colorado State University

- [023 – present:]{.fw-bold} 	Research Scientist, Colorado State University
